title: Fresh Strawberry Sauce
introduction: Fresh Strawberry Sauce is a delightful and versatile addition to any dessert. This fruity and vibrant sauce captures the essence of fresh strawberries, and it can also be adapted for raspberries. When using raspberries, simply strain the sauce to remove the seeds for a smoother texture.
ingredients: 1 pint fresh strawberries, rinsed and hulled
2 tablespoons orange liqueur, cassis, or light rum
instructions: In a food processor or blender, combine all of the ingredients.
Serve or transfer to an airtight container and store in the refrigerator up to 24 hours.
variations: Raspberries can also be used in place of strawberries. If using raspberries, strain the sauce to eliminate the seeds.
